channel.title: I'm looking for examples of great marketing sites of freelancers and consultants
channel.description: If you know a site of a freelancer or consultant which you think is really great, then please post it here. I'm looking preferably for German sites, but not exclusively.

item.title: I'm looking for examples of great marketing sites of freelancers and consultants
item.dc:creator: chh
item.description:
Thanks Travis, that’s exactly what I was looking for.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm looking for examples of great marketing sites of freelancers and consultants
item.dc:creator: TravisP
item.description:
Perhaps you are looking for something like this? The downside is it’s a fairly huge site to load, so on slower connections the experience I don’t think is as good.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm looking for examples of great marketing sites of freelancers and consultants

item.title: I'm looking for examples of great marketing sites of freelancers and consultants
item.dc:creator: mustafa
item.description:
Sorry, I am not familiar with this kind of websites/services.

It depends on how you see them but these websites aren’t job boards (like StepStone and Monster).
You can find good freelancers there.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm looking for examples of great marketing sites of freelancers and consultants

item.title: I'm looking for examples of great marketing sites of freelancers and consultants
item.dc:creator: chh
item.description:
Hi Mustafa thanks for the reply. I think I wasn’t clear enough. I’m looking for sites of individual freelancers and consultants, not sites which are job boards.

I really like http://www.webclio.com for example. These are sites I’m looking for.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm looking for examples of great marketing sites of freelancers and consultants

item.title: I'm looking for examples of great marketing sites of freelancers and consultants
item.dc:creator: mustafa
item.description:
Here are a couple of them:

  1. http://www.twago.de/ (from Germany)
  2. https://www.odesk.com/de/
  3. https://www.freelancer.de/
  4. https://www.elance.com/

These are the most famous ones, you can find more if you do some googling.

Read full topic
